scripts.start:
bash -c 'mkdir -p logs; if [ -f out.log ]; then ampm=$(date +%p | tr A-Z a-z); mv out.log "logs/out-$(date +%Y-%m-%d-%I.%M.%S) ${ampm}.log"; fi; printf "starting "; version="nor-customs bot v$(node -p "require('"'"'./package.json'"'"').version")"; printf "%s\n" "${version}"; (printf "%s\n" "${version}
"; nohup bun dev) > out.log 2>/dev/null & echo $! > .pid'
scripts.stop:
bash -c 'printf "current version:
"; printf "nor-customs bot v$(node -p "require('"'"'./package.json'"'"').version")
";printf "
out.log:
"; cat out.log && printf "
" && if [ -f .pid ]; then kill $(cat .pid) && rm .pid; else pkill -f "bun dev"; fi'
scripts.status:
bash -c 'printf "current version:
"; printf "nor-customs bot v$(node -p "require('"'"'./package.json'"'"').version")
";printf "
out.log:
"; cat out.log && printf "
" && if [ -f .pid ] && ps -p $(cat .pid) > /dev/null 2>&1; then printf "Bot is running (PID: $(cat .pid))

"; fi'
